weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, and good for making snowmen. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am frozen.
⛄ You can play with me.
🌬️ I often fall in winter.

weather.question: I'm a big ball of light that warms the Earth. I disappear at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I am very bright.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I come after rain, and I have many colors. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am made of light.
🍀 Some people think there's gold at my end.
💧 I appear when sunlight shines through raindrops.

weather.question: I am white and puffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌧️ I am made of water droplets or ice crystals.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I'm water falling from the sky, helping plants grow. You need an umbrella when I come down. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles.
🌱 Plants need me.
💦 I am liquid.

weather.question: I howl and blow and can knock down trees. Hold on to your hat when I come around! What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I am moving air.
🍃 I can make leaves fly.
🌪️ Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong.

weather.question: I am ice that falls from the sky. I can be small or very big and cause damage to cars. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I often come during thunderstorms.

weather.question: I'm a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud boom. I am very dangerous! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity in the sky.
🌩️ I come during a thunderstorm.
💥 I am followed by thunder.

weather.question: I am a whirling, violent storm with a funnel-shaped cloud. It is best to take shelter when I am near. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have very strong winds.
🏠 I can destroy houses.
🐄 Dorothy was in one in The Wizard of Oz.

weather.question: I'm a big storm that forms over warm ocean waters, with strong winds and lots of rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I cause flooding.
🌀 I have a swirling center called an eye.
🧭 People give me names.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I appear every day. I give you light, so you can play. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I'm hot and fiery.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
🌎 I rise in the East and set in the West.

cosmos.question: I'm a glowing ball of gas, far, far away. You see me twinkle at the end of the day. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am much bigger than planets.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.
⭐ I am often found in constellations.

cosmos.question: I travel around the Sun each year. I'm where you live, can you make that clear? What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and animals live here.
💧 I am mostly made up of water and land.
🌍 People call me home.

cosmos.question: I spin around Earth, a nightly light. I change my shape, from thin to bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full.
🌚 I have phases like waxing and waning.
🌑 I am Earth's natural satellite.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, dusty and cold. Scientists search for life, brave and bold. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People send rovers to explore me.
🔴 My surface is reddish in color.
🪐 I am the fourth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant planet with a big red spot. I have many moons, quite a lot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My red spot is a giant storm.
🌌 I'm the largest planet in our solar system.
🪐 I am made mostly of gases.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings made of ice and rock. I am a gas giant, give me a knock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but very thin.
💨 I am less dense than water.
🪐 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars, making a picture in the night. Some are animals, some are people, shining so bright. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 minor is a type of me.
📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.
✨ I can help you navigate.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust. I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 The Milky Way is a type of me.
🔭 Scientists use telescopes to study me.
💫 I am held together by gravity.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust, with a tail behind. I travel around the Sun, on a path you can't find. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
💥 I am often called a dirty snowball.
💫 I come from the Oort cloud or the Kuiper belt.
